attributes.action: Ban the use or roller skatesof any type in indoor areas like shops for peoples health and safety
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Ban the use or roller skates of any type in indoor areas like shops or shopping centres if your in a supermarket on a busy weekend full of people the last thing you want is kind on roller skates in there using it as a racing circuit or skating round the shop if there are staff up ladders or pushing drlivery cadges trollys or pallet trucks or even Fork Lift Trucks someone can get seriously injured member of public or staff if im up a high ladder I dont want kind roller skating arround the shop fllor remember supermarkets are workplaces staff safety needs to come first.
